Address.value: 200 CRESCENT COURT,SUITE 1400, DALLAS, Texas, 75201, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: First Foundation Inc is a financial services company. It is engaged in providing investment management and financial planning services for high net-worth individuals, retirement plans, charitable institutions, and private foundations. The company focuses on segments namely Banking and Wealth Management. It also offers loans to individuals and entities that own and operate multifamily residential and commercial real estate properties as well as business banking products and services to small to moderate-sized businesses, professional firms, and consumer banking products and services to individuals.

value.name: Christopher M. Naghibi
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
